name: Mayan God
description:
The first game of my life !

Hello,

In this game, you have to survive the test of the " God of Masks", to become the king of your village. For that purpose, you got have to use elementary masks for in order to protect yourself from The projectiles which he sends To you, thanks to his portal.


Good luck and have fun !

Made by :

  • Elysioh (game design and code)
  • Yung Castro (art)

Music by :

  • Mikroben Krieg (Intelligent tribal madness)
  • David Szesztay (Tribal)
  • Blue Dot Sessions (Are We Loose Yet)

(http://freemusicarchive.org)
